TEXT.S: Coit Albertson kawas tay 1880, ryax sa tay 14 nqu tay 10, Coit Albertson, squliq na Bunge'. (wal mhuqil sa kawas tay 1953) Coit Albertson htagan beh sa Reading,Pennsylvania. George ru Elizabeth yaba yaya nya. Coit Albertson aring qnxan na mqwas ru myugi maki Broadway. 1920 kawas hiya ga blaq balay mrhuw.
